panels.description: ISS proceeds in epochs with stable leader assignments to "segments" and stable topology (i.e., sequencers can be added and remove only at epoch boundaries and leaders are reassigned to segments also at epoch boundaries). This is the current epoch.
panels.title: Current Epoch

panels.description: Size in blocks of the current epoch.
panels.title: Epoch Length

panels.description: Number of active validators
panels.title: Validators

panels.description: Number of connected and authenticated P2P peers for the selected sequencer. It should be > 2/3 at all times.
panels.title: Peers

panels.description: Total number of blocks ordered and output to the read path. When there is no traffic, a block can be empty.
panels.title: Total Output Blocks

panels.description: Total number of requests ordered and output to the read path.
panels.title: Total Output Requests

panels.description: The size of a weak quorum or non-faulty nodes, needed e.g. to disseminate batches
panels.title: Weak quorum

panels.description: The size of a strong quorum, needed for ordering consensus
panels.title: Strong quorum

panels.description: Sequencers that are part of the BFT ordering topology
panels.title: BFT ordering members

panels.description: Sequencers that are allowed to propose blocks for ordering
panels.title: BFT ordering leaders

panels.description: Rate of blocks ordered and output to the read path.
panels.title: Throughput - blocks/s

panels.description: Number of requests per consensus block.
panels.title: Requests / Block

panels.description: Rate of requests ordered and output to the read path.
panels.title: Throughput - requests/s

panels.description: Number of batches (proofs of availability) per consensus block. Note that < 1 average batch per block likely means empty blocks are being created.
panels.title: Batches (PoAs) / Block

panels.description: Rate of batches (proofs of availability) ordered and output to the read path.
panels.title: Throughput - batches/s

panels.description: How many epochs a sequencer is blacklisted
panels.title: Blacklisted Sequencers

panels.description: Wall-clock time of the ordered block being provided to the sequencer minus BFT time of the block
panels.title: Block delay

panels.description: Size of the payloads of blocks ordered and output to the read path.
panels.title: Output Block Payload Size

panels.description: Count of non-compliant and possibly byzantine protocol behaviors detected by the currently selected sequencer.
panels.title: Non-compliant behaviors

panels.description: Percentage of votes received by the currently selected sequencer at every major PBFT stage. Should be > 2/3 at all times, else a leader change ("view change" in PBFT parlance) occurs automatically.
panels.title: PBFT Voting Power %

panels.description: Number of proposals requested by consensus.
panels.title: Block proposals requested by consensus

panels.description: Number of batches requested by the availability module and not yet provided.
panels.title: Outstanding batch requests

panels.description: Number of batches that are being disseminated.
panels.title: Batches being disseminated

panels.description: Size of the incoming requests buffer ("mempool") for the selected sequencer. Its maximum size in bytes and requests count can be currently set via static configuration.
panels.title: Mempool Size (requests)

panels.description: Number of requests in batches that are being disseminated.
panels.title: Requests being disseminated

panels.description: Number of batches requested to be proposed in consensus.
panels.title: Block proposals requested by consensus (batches)

panels.description: Number of payload bytes in requests within batches that are being disseminated.
panels.title: Bytes being disseminated

panels.description: Total network ingress for the currently selected sequencer split by sender.
panels.title: Total Network Input

panels.description: Total network egress for the currently selected sequencer split by destination.
panels.title: Total Network Output
